TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Conversation extends Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ServiceObject

Docs.summary: Represents a conversation.

remarks.para: A collection of Conversation objects is returned by the method for the class. Property definitions for the Conversation class are defined in the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Categories As StringList

Docs.summary: Gets the category list for conversation items in the current folder.

remarks.para: Use the property to get the category list for all conversation items in a mailbox.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ClearItemFlags(class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.FolderId contextFolderId) cil managed

Docs.param: The identifier of the folder whose items will be unflagged. If the value of the parameter is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), flags for items in conversations across the entire mailbox are cleared.
Docs.summary: Clears the flagged status on items in the associated conversation. The method is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

remarks.para: Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CopyItemsInConversation(class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.FolderId contextFolderId, class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.FolderId destinationFolderId) cil managed
Public Sub CopyItemsInConversation (contextFolderId As FolderId, destinationFolderId As FolderId)

Docs.param: The folder identifier of the folder that contains the conversation items to copy. If this argument is set to a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), all items in a conversation across an entire mailbox are copied to the destination folder.
The destination folder identifier of the folder that will contain the copied items.
Docs.summary: Copies items in the conversation to a specified folder.

remarks.para: Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DeleteItems(class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.FolderId contextFolderId, valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.DeleteMode deleteMode) cil managed

Docs.param: The folder identifier of the folder that contains the conversation items to delete. If this argument is set to a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), all items in a conversation across an entire mailbox are deleted.
The deletion mode.
Docs.summary: Deletes items in the conversation.

remarks.para: Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DisableAlwaysCategorizeItems(bool processSynchronously) cil managed

Docs.param: true to indicate whether the method should return after it has completed disabling categorization and removing the categories from existing items in the conversation; false if the method is to return immediately.
Docs.summary: Disables automatic categorization of items in a conversation.

remarks.para: Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DisableAlwaysDeleteItems(bool processSynchronously) cil managed

Docs.param: true to indicate whether the method should return after it has completed disabling automatic move of items in a conversation to the Deleted Items folder and has restored the deleted items to their original folders; false if the method is to return immediately.
Docs.summary: Disables the automatic move of items in a conversation to the Deleted Items folder.

remarks.para: Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DisableAlwaysMoveItemsInConversation(bool processSynchronously) cil managed

Docs.param: true to indicate whether the method should return after it has completed disabling automatic move of items in a conversation to the target folder; false if the method is to return immediately.
Docs.summary: Disables the automatic move of items in a conversation to a target folder.

remarks.para: Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DraftItemIds As ItemIdCollection

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of draft item identifiers for items that have not yet been sent.
Docs.value: Returns a collection of draft item identifiers.

MemberSignature.Value: public void EnableAlwaysCategorizeItems (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string> categories, bool processSynchronously);
.method public hidebysig instance void EnableAlwaysCategorizeItems(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> categories, bool processSynchronously) cil managed
Public Sub EnableAlwaysCategorizeItems (categories As IEnumerable(Of String), processSynchronously As Boolean)

Docs.param: The categories to automatically be applied to items in a conversation.

true to indicate whether the method should return after it has completed enabling categorization and adding the categories to existing items in the conversation; false if the method is to return immediately.
Docs.summary: Enables the automatic categorization of items in a conversation.

remarks.para: Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EnableAlwaysDeleteItems(bool processSynchronously) cil managed

Docs.param: true to indicate whether the method should return after it has completed enabling the automatic move of items in a conversation to the Deleted Items folder and has moved existing items in a conversation to the Deleted Items folder; false if the method is to return immediately.
Docs.summary: Enables the automatic move of items in a conversation to the Deleted Items folder.

remarks.para: Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).

MemberSignature.Value: public void EnableAlwaysMoveItems (Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.FolderId destinationFolderId, bool processSynchronously);
.method public hidebysig instance void EnableAlwaysMoveItems(class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.FolderId destinationFolderId, bool processSynchronously) cil managed
Public Sub EnableAlwaysMoveItems (destinationFolderId As FolderId, processSynchronously As Boolean)

Docs.param: The identifier of the folder to which conversation items are moved.

true to indicate whether the method should return after it has completed enabling the automatic move of items in a conversation to the target folder and has moved existing conversation items to the target folder; false if the method is to return immediately.
Docs.summary: Enables the automatic move of new and existing items in a conversation to a target folder.

remarks.para: Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).

MemberSignature.Value: public void FlagItems (Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.FolderId contextFolderId, Nullable<DateTime> startDate, Nullable<DateTime> dueDate);

.method public hidebysig instance void FlagItems(class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.FolderId contextFolderId, valuetype System.Nullable`1<valuetype System.DateTime> startDate, valuetype System.Nullable`1<valuetype System.DateTime> dueDate) cil managed
Public Sub FlagItems (contextFolderId As FolderId, startDate As Nullable(Of DateTime), dueDate As Nullable(Of DateTime))
public: void FlagItems(Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::FolderId ^ contextFolderId, Nullable<DateTime> startDate, Nullable<DateTime> dueDate);

Docs.param: The identifer of the folder whose items will be flagged. If the value of the parameter is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), items in the associated conversation across the entire mailbox are flagged.
The start date (can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic)).
The due date (can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic)).
Docs.summary: Sets the flagged status on items in the associated conversation. The method is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

remarks.para: Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).

MemberSignature.Value: public void FlagItemsComplete (Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.FolderId contextFolderId, Nullable<DateTime> completeDate);

.method public hidebysig instance void FlagItemsComplete(class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.FolderId contextFolderId, valuetype System.Nullable`1<valuetype System.DateTime> completeDate) cil managed
Public Sub FlagItemsComplete (contextFolderId As FolderId, completeDate As Nullable(Of DateTime))

Docs.param: The identifer of the folder whose items will be flagged as complete. If the value of the parameter is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), items in conversation across the entire mailbox are marked as complete.
The complete date (can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic)).
Docs.summary: Changes the flagged status of items in the associated conversation to complete. The method is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

remarks.para: Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FlagStatus As ConversationFlagStatus

Docs.summary: Gets the aggregated flag status for conversation items in the current folder.

remarks.para: Use the property to get the aggregated flag status for all conversation items in a mailbox.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GlobalCategories As StringList

Docs.summary: Gets the category list for all conversation items in a mailbox.

remarks.para: Use the property to get the category list for conversation items in the current folder.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GlobalFlagStatus As ConversationFlagStatus

Docs.summary: Gets the aggregated flag status for all conversation items in a mailbox.

remarks.para: Use the property to get the aggregated flag status for all conversation items in the current folder.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GlobalHasAttachments As Boolean
public: property bool GlobalHasAttachments { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether at least one conversation item in a mailbox has an attachment.
Docs.value: true if at least one conversation item in a mailbox has an attachment; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GlobalHasIrm As Boolean
public: property bool GlobalHasIrm { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether at least one conversation item in any folder in a mailbox is protected by Information Rights Management (IRM).The property is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with 15.00.0847.032.
Docs.value: true if at least one conversation item in a mailbox is protected by IRM; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GlobalIconIndex As IconIndex

Docs.summary: Gets the global icon index.The property is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GlobalImportance As Importance

Docs.summary: Gets the aggregated importance for all conversation items in a mailbox.
Docs.value: The global importance of a conversation.

remarks.para: Use the property to get the aggregated importance for all conversation items in the current folder.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GlobalItemClasses As StringList

Docs.summary: Gets a list of item classes that represents all the item classes of the conversation items in a mailbox.

remarks.para: Use the property to get the item classes of all the conversation items in the current folder.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GlobalItemIds As ItemIdCollection

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of item identifiers for all conversation items in a mailbox.

remarks.para: Use the property to get the item identifiers for all conversation items in the current folder.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GlobalLastDeliveryTime As DateTime
public: property DateTime GlobalLastDeliveryTime { DateTime get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the delivery time of the message that was last received in this conversation across all folders in the mailbox..
Docs.value: The delivery time of the last conversation item.

remarks.para: Use the property to get the delivery time of the conversation item that was last received in the current folder.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GlobalMessageCount As Integer
public: property int GlobalMessageCount { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the total number of conversation items in the mailbox.

remarks.para: Use the property to get the total number of conversation items in the current folder.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GlobalSize As Integer
public: property int GlobalSize { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the size of the conversation calculated from the size of all conversation items in the mailbox.
Docs.value: The size of the conversation in KBs.

remarks.para: Use the property to get the size of the conversation calculated from the size of all conversation items in the current folder.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GlobalUniqueRecipients As StringList

Docs.summary: Gets a list of all the people who have received messages in this conversation across all folders in the mailbox.

remarks.para: Use the property to get the list of all the recipients of conversation items in the current folder.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GlobalUniqueSenders As StringList

Docs.summary: Gets a list of all the senders of conversation items in the mailbox.

remarks.para: Use the property to get the list of all the senders of conversation items in the current folder.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GlobalUniqueUnreadSenders As StringList

Docs.summary: Gets a list of all the people who have sent messages that are currently unread in this conversation across all folders in the mailbox.

remarks.para: Use the property to get the list of all the senders of unread conversation items in the current folder.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GlobalUnreadCount As Integer
public: property int GlobalUnreadCount { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a count of all the unread conversation items in the mailbox.

remarks.para: Use the property to get the count of all unread conversation items in the current folder.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasAttachments As Boolean
public: property bool HasAttachments { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether at least one conversation item in the current folder has an attachment.
Docs.value: true if at least one conversation item in the current folder has an attachment; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasIrm As Boolean
public: property bool HasIrm { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether at least one conversation item in the current folder is protected by Information Rights Management (IRM).The property is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with 15.00.0847.032.
Docs.value: true if at least one conversation item in the current folder is protected by IRM; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IconIndex As IconIndex

Docs.summary: Gets the icon index.The property is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Id As ConversationId

Docs.summary: Gets the conversation identifier.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Importance As Importance

Docs.summary: Gets the aggregated importance for all conversation items in the current folder.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InstanceKey As Byte()
public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ InstanceKey { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the conversation instance key. The property is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ItemClasses As StringList

Docs.summary: Gets a list of item classes that represents all the item classes of the conversation items in the current folder.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ItemIds As ItemIdCollection

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of item identifiers for all conversation items in the current folder.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LastDeliveryTime As DateTime
public: property DateTime LastDeliveryTime { DateTime get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the delivery time of the message that was last received in this conversation in the current folder.
Docs.value: The delivery time of the last conversation item.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LastModifiedTime As DateTime
public: property DateTime LastModifiedTime { DateTime get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the date and time this conversation was last modified. The property is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.
Docs.value: The date and time this conversation was last modified.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MessageCount As Integer
public: property int MessageCount { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the total number of conversation items in the current folder.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void MoveItemsInConversation(class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.FolderId contextFolderId, class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.FolderId destinationFolderId) cil managed
Public Sub MoveItemsInConversation (contextFolderId As FolderId, destinationFolderId As FolderId)

Docs.param: The folder identifier of the folder that contains the conversation items to move. If this argument is set to a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), all items in a conversation across an entire mailbox are moved to the destination folder.
The destination folder identifier of the folder that will contain the moved items.
Docs.summary: Moves items in a conversation to a destination folder.

remarks.para: Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Preview As String
public: property System::String ^ Preview { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the conversation preview. The property is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetReadStateForItemsInConversation (Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.FolderId contextFolderId, bool isRead);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetReadStateForItemsInConversation(class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.FolderId contextFolderId, bool isRead) cil managed
Public Sub SetReadStateForItemsInConversation (contextFolderId As FolderId, isRead As Boolean)

Docs.param: The identifier of the folder whose items will have their read state updated. If the value of the parameter is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), the read state of all items in the associated conversation across an entire mailbox will be updated.
true if conversation items are marked as read; otherwise, false.
Docs.summary: Sets the read state of items in a conversation.The method is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

remarks.para: Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetReadStateForItemsInConversation (Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.FolderId contextFolderId, bool isRead, bool suppressReadReceipts);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetReadStateForItemsInConversation(class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.FolderId contextFolderId, bool isRead, bool suppressReadReceipts) cil managed
Public Sub SetReadStateForItemsInConversation (contextFolderId As FolderId, isRead As Boolean, suppressReadReceipts As Boolean)
public: void SetReadStateForItemsInConversation(Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::FolderId ^ contextFolderId, bool isRead, bool suppressReadReceipts);

Docs.param: The identifier of the folder whose items will have their read state updated. If the value of the parameter is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), the read states of items across the entire mailbox are set.
true, if conversation items are marked as read; otherwise, false.
true if read receipts are suppressed; otherwise, false.
Docs.summary: Sets the read state of items in the specified conversation. The method is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

remarks.para: Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetRetentionPolicyForItemsInConversation (Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.FolderId contextFolderId, Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.RetentionType retentionPolicyType, Nullable<Guid> retentionPolicyTagId);

.method public hidebysig instance void SetRetentionPolicyForItemsInConversation(class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.FolderId contextFolderId, valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.RetentionType retentionPolicyType, valuetype System.Nullable`1<valuetype System.Guid> retentionPolicyTagId) cil managed
Public Sub SetRetentionPolicyForItemsInConversation (contextFolderId As FolderId, retentionPolicyType As RetentionType, retentionPolicyTagId As Nullable(Of Guid))

public: void SetRetentionPolicyForItemsInConversation(Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::FolderId ^ contextFolderId, Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::RetentionType retentionPolicyType, Nullable<Guid> retentionPolicyTagId);

Docs.param: The identifier of the folder whose items will have their retention policy set. If the value of the parameter is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), the retention policy of items across the entire mailbox are set.
A value indicating whether the tagged object is to be archived or deleted.
The retention policy tag identifier. A a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) value will clear the policy.
Docs.summary: Sets the retention policy of items in the specified conversation. The method is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

remarks.para: Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Size As Integer
public: property int Size { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the size of the conversation calculated from the size of all conversation items in the current folder.
Docs.value: The size of the conversation in KBs.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Topic As String
public: property System::String ^ Topic { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the topic of the conversation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UniqueRecipients As StringList

Docs.summary: Gets a list of all the people who have received messages in this conversation for messages in the current folder.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UniqueSenders As StringList

Docs.summary: Gets a list of all the senders of conversation items in the current folder.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UniqueUnreadSenders As StringList

Docs.summary: Gets a list of all the people who have sent messages that are currently unread in this conversation in the current folder.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UnreadCount As Integer
public: property int UnreadCount { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a count of all the unread conversation items in the current folder.
